channel.title: BBC on this is rob dyke dot com
channel.description: Recent content in BBC on this is rob dyke dot com

item.title: the Beeb
item.description: “The story of the BBC Micro is one of British innovation; it’s about how one machine inspired a generation of youngsters to use computers,” said Dr Blyth. The BBC Micro was host to my first computing experiences. According to the BBC, the Science Museum plans an exhibition about the BBC Micro and its legacy in 2009 - I’ll be there.
